name: AmpUp
headline: We make EV charging as simple and reliable as LED lights
description: AmpUp provides the simplicity and reliability enabled Tesla experience EV charging solution in private commercial locations where vehicle dwell times are 6 hours and longer; EG, workplaces, MUDs, and fleet depots. Within 2 years, it achieved 8th in ranking in market share in the commercial level 2 charging sector in the US. AmpUp is growing even faster now with their dominant growth channel in the commercial lighting vertical set to take off at the end of 2023 and early 2024.

The AmpUp Platform
## Ready, Set, 
## Let’s Go Electric
AmpUp is made for growing and established EV networks alike, offering everything you need to manage, optimize, and scale your charging operations with ease.
[Explore the Platform](https://ampup.io/</products/ev-charging-management-software>)
[](https://ampup.io/</products/ev-charging-management-software>)
##### AmpUp EV Cloud
### Your Charging Network Control Center
Monitor, optimize, and control your EV chargers with software designed for scalability. From real-time analytics to dynamic load management, AmpUp EV Cloud does it all.
![A woman using the EV Cloud charger management platform on an iPad](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/677db2c3f0c1770cc6284b85_ampup-ev-cloud-platform.jpg)
[](https://ampup.io/</products/ev-charging-app-for-drivers>)
##### AmpUp EV Driver App
### EV Charging Made Easy for Your Drivers
Give drivers an all-in-one charging app that makes it easy to find, reserve, and pay for charging sessions. AmpUp makes charging intuitive and efficient for EV drivers.
![An electric vehicle driver using the app to find EV charging near me](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/677db2e744184e2975704514_ampup-ev-driver-app.jpg)
[](https://ampup.io/</contact>)
##### Now In Pre-Release
### EV Charger Monitoring and Maintenance
Protect your network with proactive monitoring and full-service maintenance packages. AmpUp's O&M service minimizes downtime and keeps your chargers humming. 
![An electrician servicing an AmpUp EV charging station](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/677db315305e6ac5f13c7e70_ampup-ev-operations-and-maintenance.jpg)
Why Choose AmpUp?
## Designed to Keep You Charging Ahead
AmpUp’s platform delivers unmatched reliability, intuitive tools, and scalable solutions tailored to meet your charging needs.
### Industry-Leading Reliability
With a 98.5% charging success rate and 99.9% uptime, AmpUp keeps your chargers running and your drivers on the move.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/67979f47f45a225aaa44df8a_ampup-lightning-icon-purple.svg)
Real-time diagnostics to address platform issues in an instant 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/67979f47f45a225aaa44df8a_ampup-lightning-icon-purple.svg)
Around-the-clock monitoring to keep your stations up and running
![AmpUp software ensuring reliable EV charger performance"](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/6759a35c85895bc970294876_reliable-ev-charging-software-ampup.jpg)
### Limitless Flexibility
Customize access, pricing, and availability to fit any charging scenario—whether public, private, or fleet-based.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/67979f47f45a225aaa44df8a_ampup-lightning-icon-purple.svg)
Tailor access for employees, tenants, guests, or fleet drivers
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/67979f47f45a225aaa44df8a_ampup-lightning-icon-purple.svg)
Set custom pricing, including free, pay-per-use, or tiered rates
![Flexible EV charging setup options for businesses](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/675f4baeea96bdc676521118_flexible-ev-charging-options.avif)
### Easy to Use for Both Operators & Drivers
AmpUp simplifies EV charging with easy access for drivers and intuitive management tools for operators. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/67979f47f45a225aaa44df8a_ampup-lightning-icon-purple.svg)
Drivers can easily access stations via web, QR codes, RFIDs, or the AmpUp app.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/67979f47f45a225aaa44df8a_ampup-lightning-icon-purple.svg)
Oversee costs, station use, and reporting, all from a single dashboard
![Simplified EV charging management for site operators and drivers](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/6759af2c82188cb62505e9b1_simple-ev-charging-management.jpg)
### Built-in Sustainability Reporting Features
Optimize energy use, reduce CO2 emissions, and qualify for energy incentives with AmpUp’s smart energy management tools.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/67979f47f45a225aaa44df8a_ampup-lightning-icon-purple.svg)
Reduce grid strain with advanced load management
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/67979f47f45a225aaa44df8a_ampup-lightning-icon-purple.svg)
Access 50+ rebates and incentives to lower installation costs
![Energy-efficient EV charging solutions with AmpUp](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6721430edeea100e231b3df2/675f4b76b0486ab0bf0725e0_sustainable-ev-charging.jpg)

generated_description:
**AmpUp: Making EV Charging Easy & Accessible**

Founded in 2018 and based in Cupertino, CA, AmpUp has quickly established itself as a prominent player in the electric vehicle (EV) charging sector. Imagine simplifying EV charging to the level of plugging in an LED light bulb—that's the ambition behind AmpUp.

Their mission? To make EV charging as simple and reliable as LED lights. Initially aimed at commercial locations where vehicles typically dwell for over six hours, AmpUp targets workplaces, multifamily units (MUDs), and fleet depots. Within just two years, they shot to the 8th position in market share for commercial level-2 charging in the U.S. Their growth trajectory suggests even more significant gains ahead as they tap into the commercial lighting vertical, expecting a strong push as 2023 wraps up and 2024 dawns. 

AmpUp's platform comprises three core products: the **AmpUp EV Cloud**, which offers real-time charger management and optimization tools; the **AmpUp EV Driver App**, designed for efficiency and ease for EV drivers; and their **Operations & Maintenance (O&M) Service**, aimed at minimizing downtime with proactive maintenance solutions.

Their customer base already includes notable names like Netflix, Under Armour, and Domino's Pizza, illustrating the diverse applications of their technology—from retail to fleet management and urban mobility solutions.

AmpUp is composed of a talented team of 45 employees, supported by Y Combinator and a partnership with nan. Their focus is squarely on sustainability, reflected in their taglines: 'climate,' 'electric vehicles,' and of course, their strong San Francisco Bay Area roots.

If you’re interested in how AmpUp is revolutionizing the EV charging experience, you can explore more at [ampup.io](https://ampup.io).

In short, AmpUp is at the forefront of making EV charging as effortless as flipping a light switch, working tirelessly to ensure electric mobility doesn’t just live in our imaginations, but in our everyday realities.
